title: BākoCorpus: A Large-Scale Open Dataset for Benchmarking Bengali NLP
authors: Asha Dey, Arnab Chakraborty, et al.
body: This paper introduces BākoCorpus, the largest open-access Bengali text corpus to date, containing over 5 billion tokens from diverse domains.

title: Towards Robust Automatic Speech Recognition for Bengali Dialects
body: We present a novel approach to ASR that leverages transfer learning to improve performance on under-resourced Bengali dialects like Sylheti.
